saying: What goes up must come down.
description: Apollo is a cranky, eagle villager in the Animal Crossing series who first appears in Doubutsu no Mori. His name possibly came from Apollo 11, the first spacecraft launched by the United States to land a man on the moon, and the Apollo Space Program itself. He is also a bald eagle, a symbol of the United States and in the Great Seal, which ties in with his birthday being July 4th - Independence Day. He also appears in 🎬 Gekijōban Doubutsu no Mori as a minor character.
